root.static-content:
These WSRP portlets are using NetUnity's public WSRP Producer, and Liferay Portal as a WSRP consumer. NetUnity's public WSRP producer URIs are here: http://www.netunitysoftware.com/wsrp2interop/wsrpproducer.asmx

This suite of NetUnity WSRP portlets are using this particular URI in the Control Panel under the WSRP section: http://www.netunitysoftware.com/wsrp2interop/wsrpproducer.asmx?Operation=SD&WsrpVersion=Two

This WSRP functionality is available as a Liferay plugin from Liferay, Inc.
